name: The Cat Eering
description:
This is a survival horror game for 2 players: YOU and YOUR CAT

To play the game you just need to use your mouse and your cat's attention. All the rest will unfold.

WARNING: The sensitivity to the game might vary from cat to cat. Make sure your cat agrees on participating in the experience before playing together. The developer does not takes responsibility for any post-traumatic disorder or hate from your cat towards you after playing the game.
